modName: Leona The Barbarian Follower CBBE HDT
summary: Add new female follower to the game base of "Barbarian who doesn't care for armor" a two handed warrior. with unique stand alone Warhammer level up with Player level from level 15.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Georgia][size=3][b]LEONA THE BARBARIAN FOLLOWER[/b] 18+

Add new female follower to the game base of "Barbarian who doesn't care for armor" a two handed warrior.
with unique stand alone Warhammer level up with Player level from level 15.

[b]Backstory[/b]

Leona are the sister of a strong bandit chief live in the wild of whiterun, a strong bandit group with enough man power to take over a village but that is not enough. So her brother make a fast decision try to pillage whiterun but fail.Â 
After he got caught and imprisoned in whiterun dungeon for a month, the news that her brother are imprisoned and torture inside the whiterun dungeon she try to attack whiterun out of rage in order to free her brother.
Then after the loss in battle in order to pay the crime she have to work under jarl as a personal guard and assassin for 8 year.
But without notice her brother have already passed away from the beginning because of sickness.

Name : Leona

Class : Barbarian

weapon : Leona Warhammer

Body : -CBBE-

Armor : None

Location :

[Whiterun Dragonsreach]

Required :
Skyrim.esm
Update.esm (latest 1.9)
Dawnguard DLC
Dragonborn[font=Georgia][font=Georgia] DLC

[b][font=Georgia][u]> > Required for HDT Version < <[/u][/font][/b]

Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE)
http://skse.silverlock.org/

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800

HDT Physics Extensions by [b]HydrogensaysHDT[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996
[/font][/font]
[b]Recommended : [/b]

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33292
The LOOT
http://loot.github.io/

[b]Small Note :[/b]
Upload version 1.2 for Leona The Barbarian follower
all that change are listed below :
two handed perks added (nothing major)
Added 3d model public hair and tattoo on upper chest to arms
Im not going to take any request of changing the appearance [u]Only[/u] to the error for the file.
for the load order i highly recommended The LOOT on Recomended list
if it still not working or cause your game to crash i suggested to remove the file.

[b]Installation : [/b]

NMM or copy to data folder

[b]Uninstall : [/b]

Remove from NMM or Delete from data folder

[b]Credit : [/b]

BETHESDA
